input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile

Item keywords:
Shake 'n Go Racers put the control of speed and power into kids hands
Just shake it up to start the "engine`"
The more you shake it up, the longer it goes
Hear cool phrases every time you let it go
Collect all the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends: Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, Batmobile and Mr. Freeze Racer
Goes up to 20 feet

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile is a top-of-the-line vehicle designed to cater to the needs of young adventurers. Equipped with the latest technologies and features, this sleek, powerful vehicle will take you on a thrilling ride through the streets of Gotham City. The Batmobile is powered by a unique 'shake-to-go' motion that allows it to zoom forward with great speed and precision. When you shake it up, the Batmobile emits cool phrases that will get you pumped up for the adventures ahead. Due to its compact design and lightweight construction, the Batmobile is easy to carry around and can be taken anywhere. Collect all the vehicles in the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends line to create the ultimate fleet of heroes and villains.
input_text.Response B:
Kids will have a blast with the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile. The more they shake it, the further it goes! Simply pick it up, give it a shake, and set it down to watch it take off. It's that easy! And the more they shake it, the faster and further it goes. Plus, it's packed with cool phrases that are sure to make kids laugh. It's the perfect gift for any child who loves Batman and the DC Super Friends.
Collect all the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends: Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, Batmobile, and Mr. Freeze Racer. Each one puts the power in kids' hands!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: B is a better descriptor for kids the target audience. But A is also good and it conveys the most of the key information.
